pattern.name: Slope
pattern.description: Calculate Pearson correlation of an attribute with time.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , (Avg(@numericalColumn * @dateColumn) - Avg(@numericalColumn) * Avg(@dateColumn)) / (StD(@numericalColumn) * StD(@dateColumn)) "@columnName" FROM @inputTable GROUP BY @baseID, @baseDate
